attributes.action: BAN THE WEARING OF FEDORA TYPES HATS BY MIDDLE AGED MEN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: OUR COUNTRY IS UNDER INCREASED THREAT BY MIDDLE-AGED MEN WEARING AN ENSEMBLE OF THE FEDORA HAT AND BERBER COAT( ANKLE LENGTH). WE PETITION THE PM TO BAN THIS PRACTICE IN THE INTERESTS OF COMMON DECENCY AND DECORUM.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
